sponsor: Sun Pharma Advanced Research Company Limited
briefTitle: Evaluation of Safety of SPARC0913 in Open Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety of SPARC0913. A multicenter, open label, non-randomized, uncontrolled, single group assignment, safety study of subjects with primary open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension is planned. Subjects will receive study medication for a period of 24-weeks.

commonTop: Eye pain, ocular hyperemia, growh of eyelashes
Influenza, Sinusitis, Conjunctivitis viral, Tooth infection
